final term 1.sheet: in case of excel format, state sheet
final term 1.column: name of the column where the needed value is
final term 1.samplename_col: name of the column containing the samplenames

final term 2.sheet: in case of excel format, state sheet 2
final term 2.column: name of the column where the needed value is 2
final term 2.samplename_col: name of the column containing the samplenames 2
